name: Even/Odd
description:
Your task is to sort the input data array so that all even numbers are at the beginning, zeros are in the middle, and odd numbers are at the end of the list
For example for [1, 6, 0, 5, 3, 4, 1, 8] need to withdraw [6, 4, 8, 0, 1, 5, 3, 1]
It is important to observe the order of the numbers.
